Initializes a new instance of the XpService class, setting up dependencies necessary for XP management.

Declaration
public XpService(DiscordSocketClient client, CommandHandler cmd, DbService db, IBotStrings strings, IDataCache cache, FontProvider fonts, IBotCredentials creds, IHttpClientFactory http, XpConfigService xpConfig, Mewdeko bot, IMemoryCache memoryCache, EventHandler eventHandler)

Type Name Description

The Discord client.
CommandHandler cmd

The command handler.
DbService db

The database service.
IBotStrings strings

The bot strings service for localization.
IDataCache cache

The data cache service.
FontProvider fonts

The font provider for image generation.
IBotCredentials creds

The bot credentials provider.
IHttpClientFactory http

The HTTP client factory for making external requests.
XpConfigService xpConfig

The XP configuration service.
Mewdeko bot

The main bot instance.
IMemoryCache memoryCache

The memory cache for storing temporary data.
EventHandler eventHandler

The event handler for subscribing to Discord events.
Remarks

Initializes services and sets up event handlers for managing XP accumulation and rewards.

AddXpDirectly(IGuildUser, IMessageChannel, int)

Adds XP directly to a user for their activity in a guild.

Declaration
public void AddXpDirectly(IGuildUser user, IMessageChannel channel, int amount)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuildUser user

The user to whom XP will be added.
IMessageChannel channel

The channel where the activity occurred.
int amount

The amount of XP to add.
Remarks

The amount must be greater than 0. This method does not check whether the user should receive XP based on cooldowns or exclusions.

GenerateXpImageAsync(IGuildUser)

Generates an XP image for a user based on their statistics and a specified template.

Declaration
public Task<Stream> GenerateXpImageAsync(IGuildUser user)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuildUser user

The guild user for whom the XP image is generated.
Returns
Type Description
Task<Stream>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the generated XP image as a stream.
Remarks

This method creates a visual representation of the user's XP, levels, and other statistics.

SetRoleReward(ulong, int, ulong?)

Sets a role reward for reaching a specified level within a guild.

Declaration
public void SetRoleReward(ulong guildId, int level, ulong? roleId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The unique identifier for the guild.
int level

The level at which the reward is given.
ulong? roleId

The unique identifier for the role to be awarded. If null, existing rewards for the level will be removed.
Remarks

This method sets or updates the role that is awarded to a user when they reach a specified level. If the roleId is null, any existing reward for the specified level is removed.

| Edit this page View Source

ToggleExcludeChannel(ulong, ulong)

Toggles the exclusion of a channel from XP gain in a specified guild.

Declaration
public Task<bool> ToggleExcludeChannel(ulong guildId, ulong chId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The unique identifier of the guild.
ulong chId

The unique identifier of the channel.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result indicates whether the channel is now excluded.
Remarks

Messages sent in excluded channels will not contribute to XP gain.

ValidateImageUrl(string)

Validates a given image URL for use as a custom XP image background.

Declaration
public static Task<(string, bool)> ValidateImageUrl(string url)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string url

The URL of the image to be validated.
Returns
Type Description
Task<(string, bool)>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a tuple indicating the validation message and whether the URL is valid.
Remarks

This method checks the URL format, accessibility, and size constraints of the image.

XpReset(ulong)

Resets the XP statistics for all users in a specific guild.

Declaration
public void XpReset(ulong guildId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The unique identifier of the guild.
Remarks

This action cannot be undone. It clears all XP data for all users in the specified guild.

Resets the XP statistics for a specific user in a specific guild.

Declaration
public void XpReset(ulong guildId, ulong userId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The unique identifier of the guild.
ulong userId

The unique identifier of the user.
Remarks

This action cannot be undone. It clears all XP data for the specified user in the specified guild.
